item.description:
Over the years, we have received many requests for a Mah Jongg night, and that is finally coming to fruition.

Hildy will be kind enough to teach those who aren't familiar with the game. National Mah Jongg League rules will be played.

This event is being cross-posted with Salem Social Cards. Please, if you are a member of both groups, only RSVP on one account. If you are already signed up to attend through SSC, you can feel free to note that in the comments section.

Damata's has a small parking lot in front on Bridge Street and additional parking to the side and behind the building. More spots are available on Ferry Street.

We request that when we hold Meetups in public establishments that everyone in attendance order at least one item or beverage.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Mah Jongg at Damatas
